DisplayName.Value: Small Subway Garage and Train Garage Asset

ShortDescription.Value: A small subway and train depot garage that can spawn up to 6 subway trains.

Publish.LongDescription:
## Small Subway Garage Asset Tired of just one huge depot for subways and trains? This is a small depot garage that can spawn up to 6 subway trains. It can be used perfectly as a small depot in the middle of your subway or train line and avoid traffic with only one depot.
## How to use it:
1 - For subway, go to the subway tab and for train go to the train tab.
2 - Place the asset on a road and connect the track at the end to your tracks.
Publish.ChangeLog: # v1.1 - Added service parking support. Vehicles will now be displayed on tracks outside the depot.
